@Infinite7Soul)","image_permalink":"http://lakkimi.tumblr.com/image/96963000884","photos":[{"caption":"","alt_sizes":[{"width":576,"height":1024,"url":"http://33.media.tumblr.com/e73a5c3bc68153e91bd48018bd2d1bfa/tumblr_nbkwtlMbJC1qehn45o1_1280.jpg"},{"width":422,"height":750,"url":"http://33.media.tumblr.com/e73a5c3bc68153e91bd48018bd2d1bfa/tumblr_nbkwtlMbJC1qehn45o1_500.jpg"},{"width":338,"height":600,"url":"http://33.media.tumblr.com/e73a5c3bc68153e91bd48018bd2d1bfa/tumblr_nbkwtlMbJC1qehn45o1_400.jpg"},{"width":225,"height":400,"url":"http://33.media.tumblr.com/e73a5c3bc68153e91bd48018bd2d1bfa/tumblr_nbkwtlMbJC1qehn45o1_250.jpg"},{"width":100,"height":178,"url":"http://38.media.tumblr.com/e73a5c3bc68153e91bd48018bd2d1bfa/tumblr_nbkwtlMbJC1qehn45o1_100.jpg"},{"width":75,"height":75,"url":"http://33.media.tumblr.com/e73a5c3bc68153e91bd48018bd2d1bfa/tumblr_nbkwtlMbJC1qehn45o1_75sq.jpg"}],"original_size":{"width":576,"height":1024,"url":"http://33.media.tumblr.com/e73a5c3bc68153e91bd48018bd2d1bfa/tumblr_nbkwtlMbJC1qehn45o1_1280.jpg"}}],"can_reply":false},{"blog_name":"flash-of-fiction","id":96962608371,"post_url":"http://flash-of-fiction.tumblr.com/post/96962608371/everyone-knows-its-monsters-who-live-in-the-closet","slug":"everyone-knows-its-monsters-who-live-in-the-closet","type":"text","date":"2014-09-08 10:40:00 GMT","timestamp":1410172800,"state":"published","format":"html","reblog_key":"Fow3vM52","tags":["Trans","Genderqueer","Transgender","Cosmic Horror","Writing","Fantasy","Sci Fi"],"short_url":"http://tmblr.co/Z9ZQkn1QJQ-pp","followed":false,"highlighted":[],"liked":false,"note_count":7,"title":"Everyone knows it's monsters who live in the closet (not that there's any correlation)","body":"[Content note: body horror/cosmic horror, ref. to transphobia]\n\n*\n\nExcerpts from the lives of several people who wish you’d stop turning it all into a first year writing student’s allegory.\n\n*\n\nHe was living as a man now. He was definitely living, and he was definitely a man. There were sharp angles casting shadows around his face that spoke to masculinity, and when you laid a hand over his chest there was a pulsing, twisting heartbeat at odds with a staccato drawing of breath. Sometimes the shadows joined in. Definitely living. Definitely a man.\n\n *\n\n<!-- more -->\n\n Anna thought she had two neighbours for the longest time. Brother and sister, perhaps even twins. Perhaps even identical twins, she thought, silently assuring herself she was an open-minded young woman who certainly wouldn’t ever bring such a thing up.\n\n When she discovered her misunderstanding, she laughed and thought, open-minded, open minded.\n\n \"The whole having two names thing kind of throws people,\" her neighbour says, Jennifer today. Her hair is long and her eyeliner spectacular. Anna would probably at least punch someone for her cheekbones. \"It always ends up like some shitty sitcom.\"\n\n \"It was the hair that threw me,\" Anna says, still laughing. \"I guess it must be a wig?\"\n\n \"Oh, no,\" says Jennifer, looking surprised, \"Hang on. Let me show you.\"\n\n Her face liquifies and rearranges itself, slipping out of reality like running water down a plughole, and Anna thinks blankly- I thought gender fluid was a metaphor.\n\n *\n\n It’s true she has a girl inside her waiting to get out. It’s true the girl doesn’t match her outside body yet, as much as it tries.\n\n Explaining that she’s actually a girl already regardless of all this, she isn’t talking about “the surgery” or HRT or whatever, and that what she actually means is the botched summoning and resulting possession… is honestly even more inconvenient than the damn thing’s attempts at taking over her body.\n\n Her teeth keep lengthening and her skin sheds scales sometimes. At least it puts the awkwardness of a second puberty into perspective.\n\n *\n\n People tell hir self determination is important, so zie goes into hir core programming and starts fucking around. Two hours later, zie’s settled on a wonderful mess of code that doesn’t have a name and is probably full of glitches, which is marvellous fun; as much as infection and replication. It makes much more sense, zie thinks, than programming hir to be ‘female’, however that concept even translates into someone without a body.\n\n \"Gender is a construct,\" says one young woman, frowning.\n\n \"The building blocks are fun,\" zie agrees serenely, exiting the chatroom before an argument about disassembling the whole idea starts up.\n\n \"You can’t choose it,\" says one rather more well meaning person, and zie sympathises, but also reminds them that zie is a self-replicating piece of malware and doesn’t really have to care about things like biological arguments and medical science, what with having access to all hir servers whenever zie wants and no hormones, brain or genitalia.\n\n \"Could you create a subroutine that generates one randomly?\" asks one curious person, and zie considers the question for a brief moment before realising zie isn’t sure.\n\n \"Let’s see :)\" zie sends in a PM.\n\n*\n\n[I wanted to write cosmic horror mundanity. I wanted to riff on annoying things trans people deal with. I wanted to riff on the idea ‘monsters’ and ‘trans people’ somehow parallel each other as though that isn’t both silly and gross. I wanted to write trans people. This happened.]\n\nThis piece is by James Elizabeth Cook. Please see here for more flash fiction by them.","can_reply":false},{"blog_name":"yongja-e","id":96961357525,"post_url":"http://yongja-e.tumblr.com/post/96961357525/b-a-p-trans-hanryu-pia-09-2014","slug":"b-a-p-trans-hanryu-pia-09-2014","type":"text","date":"2014-09-08 10:04:48 GMT","timestamp":1410170688,"state":"published","format":"html","reblog_key":"8LYHsP3H","tags":["trans","my stuff","so hungry","bap","b.a.p","yongguk","himchan","daehyun","youngjae","jongup","zelo","lol this has been sitting in my drafts since forever"],"short_url":"http://tmblr.co/ZlKgAv1QJMERL","followed":false,"highlighted":[],"liked":false,"note_count":13,"title":"[B.A.P] [TRANS] Hanryu Pia 09/2014","body":"\"NO MERCY\", released earlier this year in February, reached 2nd place on Oricon Weekly Chart. Since March, they have toured around four continents in their Pacific Tour, meeting their fans around the world. Since their debut in 2012, although it has only been 2 years, with this momentum, it is as if B.A.P does not know how to stop.\n\nIn their last interview, they said they “wanted to create a meaningful concert which has something that remains even when it is over” (HIMCHAN). After 3 months of the Pacific Tour, what has remained with them?\n\nYOUNGJAE: Really, I think the time spent with meeting the fans was the most precious time. There was an urge to start a tour again as soon as possible, to use our experiences this time as a basis to build upon an even better tour next time.\nYONGGUK: In this tour, we have visited many countries and places that we haven’t been to before, like Europe, Australia, Chicago and LA in the States - every one of them have left a deep impression!\nZELO: The impressions of fans in different countries are very different. In the States, although we were performing a distance away from the town centre, we were very happy that there were still lots of people who came to cheer for us.\n\nThe last stop of the tour was Japan. The 8500 fans at the final stop in Chiba Messe were very excited.\n\nJONGUP: The cheering from fans has got louder than before, and we could feel that we are having fun together. We were very surprised that the fans stood up and waited before the concert started, and were very touched.\nYOUNGJAE: In the last concert, I went down to the audience seats. Then one fan came and caught me… (laughs). Although I was happy and laughed at the spot, as there were many people, I was worried about [the fan(s)] being injured. I am glad it did not turn into an accident. It left a big impression.\nHIMCHAN: It is lonely once the tour has ended, and there are fans who feel sad as well. It is overwhelming for me too.\nZELO: I noticed that the age range of fans who enjoy our concerts has widened from previous concerts in Japan. I am surprised that there are also elderlies and families who come to our concerts.\n\nAlthough B.A.P says that it’s their first time going to lots of places on this tour, when asked about how they spend their time on days other than the concert, it seems that all of them replied with “shopping!”.\n\nDAEHYUN: When speaking of an activity that we all enjoy together, it has to be shopping (laughs). After sight-seeing and taking photos, if there is time left, it’s mainly shopping.\nYONGGUK: We would all go to shops that we wanted to visit, right? Then we would visit landmarks, and there would also be times when we just drink coffee at a cafe and observe people.\nJONGUP: Also, we would play basketball at the place. In America, we played basketball in a nearby court with the locals. It was a lot of fun (laughs).\n\nHaving grown after a long overseas tour, B.A.P is releasing “EXCUSE ME” in Japan on 3 September. Having been compiled into their 3rd Korean album “BADMAN”, it is the Japanese version of a song that has gathered a lot of popularity.\n\nHIMCHAN: Although it’s originally a Korean song and is now being made into Japanese, I think it’s been made into a song that is easy for our Japanese fans to sing along together. It’s a cheerful song, so let’s enjoy it together!\nYONGGUK: It is a strong hip-hop song that has our colour. It has received a lot of positive response during our tour, so now it has become the title song of our Japanese album. The coupling song “COFFEE SHOP” is a bit different from our usual strong style, being a soft jazz. “ZERO” is hip-hop style, but its atmosphere is again different from “EXCUSE ME”, being more of a “prankster” kind of song.\nDAEHYUN: The song that we would like [you] to listen to in the summer onwards, really, is probably “EXCUSE ME”. It is the most exciting song, so I recommend it for summer!\n\nIt has been 10 months since your debut in Japan last autumn. To B.A.P what do these 10 months mean?\n\nDAEHYUN: I think these 10 months has been a time for us to experience what we haven’t experienced before. Being able to finally meet lots of fans, it was precious and meaningful time.\nZELO: I also feel that we have grown bit by bit through tours and concerts. We have visited lots of countries that we haven’t been to before, and through interacting with fans of different nationalities we have learnt a lot about cultures as well. It was a time when we learned about a lot of different things.\n\nAlthough you’ve been to Japan lots of times, after these 10 months, are there any moments when you have realised some “surprising Japanese culture”?\n\nHIMCHAN: When we were having an event in Odaiba, there was a huge Gundam! It was very surprising (laughs). I was so surprised, this is what that has left the greatest impression on me (laughs).\nYONGGUK: Croissant taiyaki! (T/N: Taiyaki: a fish-shaped sweet bun with red bean paste filling) It’s covered with sugar and packed with fillings inside. It was really delicious!\nHIMCHAN: Regarding food, the strangest one are probably Monjyayaki (T/N: a sort of savoury pancake) and Gyutan (T/N: ox tongue) (laughs).\nJONGUP: Ah, gyutan… When I knew what it really is, there was a weird feelings… The tongue of a cow…\nALL: (laughs)\nZELO: During the hand-shaking events, I am surprised by the number of fans who cosplayed as me. “NO MERCY” era and “Warrior” era when I first debuted were all cosplayed so well, I felt slightly weird as if seeing myself (laughs).\nHIMCHAN: Because Zelo always has a very characteristic style like hair style and outfit, it is always very easy to spot fans who are cosplaying as him.\n\nIt is B.A.P’s Japan debut first anniversary this October. The anniversary is very soon, and events are being held in September just before. Let’s hear from the members what they would like to try during their first anniversary.\n\nYOUNGJAE: As it’s our first anniversary, maybe we can hold a special event. Something like a discussion meeting where fans consult us about their troubles would be great. We would consult them about our troubles too. Then, should we go shopping together? In practice, that would be difficult (laughs).\nHIMCHAN: On our first anniversary, I would like to go to Japan with our members not for work but on private. It will be a secret from the staff (laughs). Going to shopping, sight-seeing and eating delicious food on our own!\nYONGGUK: For me, on a special day like the first anniversary, I would of course like to spend it with fans.\nYOUNGJAE: Then we can celebrate ourselves. It would be great if we can even make couple rings (laughs). Pajama party sounds good too (laughs).\n\nB.A.P runs their daily schedule as one of the groups who strive to reach the top of K-POP. While your private time lessens, if you walk on the streets fans would be drawn and stir things up. If they had a day when they wouldn’t catch anyone’s eye, what would they do?\n\nDAEHYUN: I would like to go to the sea and the beach. Near my home there is a beach which I used to go to a lot, but recently I haven’t got any time so I don’t really visit there anymore…\nYONGGUK: I would like to go back to my home, to meet my family after long, and spend a day together in leisure.\n\nLet B.A.P deliver us a final message for us.\nDAEHYUN: To our fans in Japan! “EXCUSE ME” is produced in Japanese so everyone can enjoy, so please look forward to it. Also, we would like to show our cool images!\nZELO: I want to meet you all soon. We will work even harder, so please give us lots of support.\nYOUNGJAE: In the events in September, we have prepared lots of interactive performances. We hope you all will have fun too!\nJONGUP: (in Japanese) I love you!\nALL: (laughs)\n\n-\n\nFeel free to take out and do whatever you want to, just please credit ^^ (yongja-e@tumblr)\n\nOriginal scans can be found here.\n\nT/N: I hope you enjoyed and as always, please do let me know if there are any errors. 4/hey-i-was-hoping-you-could-discreetly-signal-boost-this","slug":"hey-i-was-hoping-you-could-discreetly-signal-boost-this","type":"answer","date":"2014-09-08 mitaii","id":96957948502,"post_url":"http://bakamitaii.tumblr.com/post/96957948502/140908-seto-kojis","slug":"140908-seto-kojis","type":"photo","date":"2014-09-08 Seto Koji’s Blog\n\n<!-- more -->\n\n気になる．．．\n\n最近周りの人から\n\n「気を抜いてる時すげ～顔してるよ(半笑)」と言われる。\n\n 「．．．。」\n\n 「はっ？」\n\n いやいや、気を抜いているのではなく集中しとるんですよ。\n\n まぁ、それを気を抜いていると思われたなら僕が悪いですが…\n\n 確かに子供の頃から何かに集中すると、とんがった口元にはなるが…\n\n それそんなに変かな？\n\n すげ～顔ってどんな顔？\n\n 今度聞いてみよう。\n\n いや、こっそり写真撮ってもらおう。\n\n 半笑いで言われるし、どんな顔なのかとても気になる。\n\nI’m curious…\n\nRecently the people around me have been saying “You make a really weird face when you are spacing out (fake laughter)”.\n\n\"….\"\n\n\"Huh?\"\n\nNo no, its not that I’m losing focus its just that I’m concentrating.\n\nWell, even though its my bad that I seemed to be spacing out…\n\nCertainly since your childhood, when focusing on something, your lips would end up in a pout…\n\nIs that very weird?\n\nA really weird face is what kind of face?\n\nI should ask them next time.\n\nNo, taking of photos secretly.\n\nSaying with a half-hearted laughter, I’m very curious as to what kind of face I made. \n\ntrans. cr; shin @ bakamitaii ; take out with My hair is getting to its awkward volume state, and it will be like this for about another month then we head into unknown territory for it has not been this long since 2010, and I wasnt on T then, so we shall see what it brings. Body, I am more “massive” than I have ever been weighing in at about 129lbs but due to my weird social ticks and not being able to cope with dining halls I will most likely start to lose weight soon, though I will do my darndest to not. It is also very close to being one year since my first tattoo and I have 4 now. So I think I am going to stop with the tattoos for a while. Acne is weird, I think I have had every possible kind in every possible place. like I even have forearm acne. Facial hair is patchy and pathetic but I am very exited about no-shave-november because it was last year around that time where it started getting actually noticeable. Living stealth is interesting, but also it has me not talking to people ever because I dont want to “lie” even though I wouldnt be lying I just wouldnt be telling them my whole life story. world: i support all the love you give me when I am sad or need support but please redirect those energies to non cis women because the institutional barriers they face combined with misogyny is a dangerous combination. Trans women are the people murdered without police investigation. Trans women are the butt of malicious jokes. Trans women are the people who fear for their lives and safety. Trans women are the people most erased in the queer community. I mean, just think of Marsha P. Johnson & Sylvia Rivera. Don’t know who they are? hmm. Time to reassess. \n\nTrans acceptance does not stop at thinking a cute white trans boy is a good human. Nah. sayin","image_permalink":"http://georgialeawesome.tumblr.com/image/96947825441","photos":[{"caption":"","alt_sizes":[{"width":537,"height":720,"url":"http://38.media.tumblr.com/a6ba2a7a459f414cbfe4d150f4599a3e/tumblr_nbkfqk5B1i1rizqqto1_1280.png"},{"width":500,"height":670,"url":"http://33.media.tumblr.com/a6ba2a7a459f414cbfe4d150f4599a3e/tumblr_nbkfqk5B1i1rizqqto1_500.png"},{"width":400,"height":536,"url":"http://33.media.tumblr.com/a6ba2a7a459f414cbfe4d150f4599a3e/tumblr_nbkfqk5B1i1rizqqto1_400.png"},{"width":250,"height":335,"url":"http://33.media.tumblr.com/a6ba2a7a459f414cbfe4d150f4599a3e/tumblr_nbkfqk5B1i1rizqqto1_250.png"},{"width":100,"height":134,"url":"http://38.media.tumblr.com/a6ba2a7a459f414cbfe4d150f4599a3e/tumblr_nbkfqk5B1i1rizqqto1_100.png"},{"width":75,"height":75,"url":"http://31.media.tumblr.com/a6ba2a7a459f414cbfe4d150f4599a3e/tumblr_nbkfqk5B1i1rizqqto1_75sq.png"}],"original_size":{"width":537,"height":720,"url":"http://38.media.tumblr.com/a6ba2a7a459f414cbfe4d150f4599a3e/tumblr_nbkfqk5B1i1rizqqto1_1280.png"}}],"can_reply":false},{"blog_name":"stillalive-py","id":96947798265,"post_url":"http://stillalive-py.tumblr.com/post/96947798265/entrevista-s-cawaii-mag-oct-2014-taeyang","slug":"entrevista-s-cawaii-mag-oct-2014-taeyang","type":"text","date":"2014-09-08 04:42:00 GMT","timestamp":1410151320,"state":"published","format":"html","reblog_key":"PMSRo41q","tags":["taeyang","bigbang","trans","traducción","vip","magazine"],"short_url":"http://tmblr.co/ZCLlcm1QIYW3v","followed":false,"highlighted":[],"liked":false,"note_count":5,"title":"[ENTREVISTA] S Cawaii Mag (OCT 2014) - TAEYANG","body":"¿Como te sentiste cuando tu nuevo álbum estuvo listo para lanzarse? \n\nMe tomé mi tiempo, fueron 4 largos años haciendolo así que este album significa mucho para mi. Me senti aliviado cuando salió.\n\nHay canciones de diferentes generos, los fans problamente se sientan muy renovados. ¿Cual es el concepto? \n\nTengo una imagen en mi mente de levantarme en una nueva mañana. Este album es muy diferente al anterior. Tanto para SOLAR y HOT, hice cosas en las cuales ya era bueno y traté de profundizar esas habilidades. Pero al correr del tiempo, pensé que habia más posibilidades para mi música. Creo que las personas ahora podran sentir las nuevas posibilidades y emociones.\n\n¿Cuál es tu canción favorita?\n\nLOVE YOU TO DEATH. Es una canción memorable porque trabajé en ella con un productor que amo, Happy Pérez. Fui muy feliz de trabajar con el en EEUU y realmente amo el sonido de esta canción.\n\n¿Cómo trabajaste con G-Dragon?\n\nEl es mi amigo más cercano, asi que no tuvimos que gastar mucho tiempo trabajando. Cuando ambos sentimos “esto es bueno” solo continuamos adelante. Nos conocemos uno al otro desde una edad muy temprana y somos muy buenos amigos que han experiementado tantas cosas juntos. Somos capaces de inspirarnos uno al otro porque lo que poseemos es diferente.\n\n¿Tu primer tour en solitario en japón empieza este agosto?\n\nQuise lanzar un album porque queria ir de gira. Realmente quise expresar mi mundo asi que planeé los videos y la conformación del escenario desde 1 a 10. Quiero seguir haciendo presentaciones donde pueda estar cerca y crear buenas memorias con todos y cada uno de mis fans.\n\n¿Cómo se sintieron los otros miembros sobre tu album?\n\nEllos estan celosos (risas) Cada uno de ellos me dieron un mensaje cuando escucharon mi album. Me dieron su apoyo porque saben cuanto tiempo y esfuerzo puse en el.\n\n¿Cuál es tu rutina diaria?\n\nMe levanto más o menor a la hora del almuerzo, las 12, y como lo que sea que hay en mi casa. Pero usualmente no tengo comida asi que solo voy a la YG y como en su cafetería. Luego entreno en el gimnasio por 1 hora y media ~ 2 . Si no hay nada mas que hacer, voy a casa y veo una pelicula o leo. Vuelvo a la oficina de nuevo y tengo una larga charla con GD y los productores porque somos buenos amigos. Si hay buenas palabras o conceptos de la conversación comienzo a trabajar en las canciones. Luego ceno y voy a casa alrededor de la 1am.\n\n¿Que parte de tu cuerpo te gusta?\n\nMi espalda. Estuve entrenando por mucho tiempo asi que tengo musculos gruesos.\n\n¿Qué quieres hacer este otoño?\n\nComer persimmon. Amo las frutas de estación. Tambien quiero ir a ver las hojas pintadas de otoño.\n\n¿Qué parte de tu cuarto te gusta?\n\nVivo en un edificio de departamentos en la ciudad y se siente tan frio asi que la verdad quiero mudarme a un lugar mas cálido. Hay un arból al lado del departamento asi que ese es mi lugar favorito para ir a renovarme.\n\n¿Qué haces por salud? \n\nComo frutas y bebo vinagre de persimmon antes de dormir. El sabor es tan malo, pero es bueno para el cuerpo asi que trato de beberlo.\n\n¿Cuál es tu estilo favorito en una chica? (Se refiere a su forma de vestir)\n\nAmo cuando viste el estilo que más le convenga a ella. Faldas o estilo urbano, lo que sea que vaya con la persona!\n\n¿Con cual de los miembros te has encontrado recientemente?\n\nCuando llegue a Japón me encontre con GD y Daesung y comimos “shabu-shabu” (plato hecho en la mesa cocinando los vegetales y trozos de carne en una hervidora). No nos habiamks visto en un tiempo asi que solo hablamos de lo que estuvimos haciendo cada uno. GD fue al tour de Daesung y me dijo que fue espectacular, asi que estuve motivado a trabajar duro tambien.\n\n¿Qué clase de cosas crees que es tierno en una chica?\n\nPara mi es solo la sensación. La verdad no me fijo en su look porque solo miro el aura de la persona. Yo creo que chicas con mi aura favorita/ sentido fresco y puro son tiernas.\n\n¿A que clase de citas quieren ir?\n\nQuiero caminar y ver los cerezos en flor. Los cerezos en flor en japón son hermosos! Realmente no me importa donde iriamos a comer. Si estoy con alguien que me gusta, puedo comer simplemente una bola de arroz (risas).\n\n¿Qué pasa cuando te gusta alguien?\n\nMe vuelvo más cuidadoso en mis palabras y acciones. Siento que no va bien que sea agresivo sin pensar. No quiero cometer un error frente a la persona que me gusta asi que trato de ser más cuidadoso.\n\n  \n\nScans: URTHESUN\n\nTrad. al inglés: mmvvip\n\nTrad. español: @angiecabs [BIGBANG Paraguay STILL Life is good.","can_reply":false},{"blog_name":"soft-radical","id":96944187853,"post_url":"http://soft-radical.tumblr.com/post/96944187853/all-the-back-of-forth-of-trans-women-are-male","slug":"all-the-back-of-forth-of-trans-women-are-male","type":"text","date":"2014-09-08 03:54:00 GMT","timestamp":1410148440,"state":"published","format":"html","reblog_key":"qLjGTT0M","tags":["thoughts","feminism","radical feminism","trans"],"short_url":"http://tmblr.co/ZvHnhn1QIKkdD","followed":false,"highlighted":[],"liked":false,"note_count":17,"title":"","body":"All the back of forth of “trans women are male” and “no they’re not they’re female” boils down to a semantics argument and I’m getting so tired of seeing it. Female describes an organism that has/had the potential to produce ova, and male describes an organism that has/had the potential to produce sperm. The biological states of either being able to produce sperm or eggs (which exist independent of gender) have become so enmeshed with gender that for many they are inseparable. I think many people would be spared a lot of stress and heartache if the terms female and male were not treated like they are interchangeable with woman and man. Words and language are so limiting.","can_reply":false},{"blog_name":"fickle-graves","id":96944003790,"post_url":"http://fickle-graves.tumblr.com/post/96944003790/are-you-trans","slug":"are-you-trans","type":"answer","date":"2014-09-08 (*ﾟ∀ﾟ)","can_reply":false},{"blog_name":"snowdressedinblack","id":96942304925,"post_url":"http://snowdressedinblack.tumblr.com/post/96942304925/hi-i-seen-you-on-the-crossdiversitycheck-blog-and-was","slug":"hi-i-seen-you-on-the-crossdiversitycheck-blog-and-was","type":"answer","date":"2014-09-08 03:30:00 GMT","timestamp":1410147000,"state":"published","format":"html","reblog_key":"dZkQmQhA","tags":["Anonymous","diversitycrosscheck","Trans","Transgender","mtf"],"short_url":"http://tmblr.co/ZQ_vdw1QIDYwT","followed":false,"highlighted":[],"liked":false,"note_count":0,"asking_name":"Anonymous","asking_url":null,"question":"hi, i seen you on the crossdiversitycheck blog, and was wondering if you could give me a hand with my trans character? She's 15 in my story, and she stared her transition from male to female at about 13. BUT im not entirely sure how to represent this like she wears makeup and dresses feminine and everything, but like what would she do about her voice and facial hair?","answer":"Hi Anon,\n\nSince I don’t know anything about your story or the characters background I’m going to assume they have a supportive family, and everyone (Doctors, therapists etc) is okay with her transition.\n\nSo if she started at 13, she would likely have been put on Testosterone blocking medication to stop puberty happening. Because of this, she would not really have to deal with facial hair. Maybe pluck the rare one that might grow, but nothing major.\n\nAs for the voice, with puberty delayed, I’m guessing the voice wouldn’t drop, or drop as much, so would still seem quite feminine.Sorry, I don’t know too much about this, I transitioned at 25, so my voice has already suffered the effects of Testosterone.\n\nTo sum it all up, your character is a girl who is about the same height as other girls, takes a pill every day or two to block Testosterone, has a feminine voice, and looks and dresses like a girl. She might have to get changed for gym class in private, but aside from that, she is just going to look like another girl.\n\nNext year, when she turns 16 (depending on where the book is set), she will have access to Estrogen or the like, so that she starts to go through puberty as a girl.\n\nI hope this help.\n\nSnow","can_reply":false},{"blog_name":"zoe-cat","id":96941922602,"post_url":"http://zoe-cat.tumblr.com/post/96941922602/hormones-day-289-september-7th-2014-month-10","slug":"hormones-day-289-september-7th-2014-month-10","type":"photo","date":"2014-09-08 03:25:40 GMT","timestamp":1410146740,"state":"published","format":"html","reblog_key":"CTuoCbjx","tags":["daily selfie","hrt selfies","hrt","hormones","trans","transgender","transition","mtf","trans girl","trans woman","dmab","amab","zoe does Renfest"],"short_url":"http://tmblr.co/ZzkJYv1QIC5ag","followed":false,"highlighted":[],"liked":false,"note_count":66,"caption":"Hormones: Day 289; September 7th, 2014\n\nMonth 10, Week 42\n\nBody is dead. something"],"short_url":"http://tmblr.co/Z6kHNn1QI4BzO","followed":false,"highlighted":[],"liked":false,"note_count":3,"caption":"","image_permalink":"http://novazerowriting.tumblr.com/image/96939851608","photos":[{"caption":"","alt_sizes":[{"width":580,"height":400,"url":"http://33.media.tumblr.com/27daf6b71e640a25361f1db621274133/tumblr_nbcajb00YO1tdnoc2o1_1280.png"},{"width":500,"height":345,"url":"http://31.media.tumblr.com/27daf6b71e640a25361f1db621274133/tumblr_nbcajb00YO1tdnoc2o1_500.png"},{"width":400,"height":276,"url":"http://33.media.tumblr.com/27daf6b71e640a25361f1db621274133/tumblr_nbcajb00YO1tdnoc2o1_400.png"},{"width":250,"height":172,"url":"http://38.media.tumblr.com/27daf6b71e640a25361f1db621274133/tumblr_nbcajb00YO1tdnoc2o1_250.png"},{"width":100,"height":69,"url":"http://38.media.tumblr.com/27daf6b71e640a25361f1db621274133/tumblr_nbcajb00YO1tdnoc2o1_100.png"},{"width":75,"height":75,"url":"http://38.media.tumblr.com/27daf6b71e640a25361f1db621274133/tumblr_nbcajb00YO1tdnoc2o1_75sq.png"}],"original_size":{"width":580,"height":400,"url":"http://33.media.tumblr.com/27daf6b71e640a25361f1db621274133/tumblr_nbcajb00YO1tdnoc2o1_1280.png"}}],"can_reply":false},{"blog_name":"transitiontransmission","id":96938955367,"post_url":"http://transitiontransmission.com/post/96938955367/the-trans-everything-ceo","slug":"the-trans-everything-ceo","type":"link","date":"2014-09-08 02:50:00 GMT","timestamp":1410144600,"state":"published","format":"html","reblog_key":"BjncgTzA","tags":["Transgender","trans","mtf","trans woman","gender identity","transgender ceo","trans*","Martine Rothblatt"],"short_url":"http://tmblr.co/Z6bOEu1QI0n9d","followed":false,"highlighted":[],"liked":false,"note_count":21,"title":"The Trans-Everything CEO","url":"http://nymag.com/news/features/martine-rothblatt-transgender-ceo/?mid=facebook_nymag","link_image":"http://33.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_nbkakaa0Gb1rge4f6_og.jpg","description":"This ‘could’ have been a great article… but it has fallen a ‘bit’ short.\n\n________________\n\nFuturist, pharma tycoon, satellite entrepreneur, philosopher. Martine Rothblatt, the highest-paid female executive in America, was born male. But that is far from the thing that defines her. Just ask her wife. Then ask the robot version of her wife.\n\nOnly about 5 percent of the companies in the Fortune 500 are run by women; double the sample size, and the proportion is the same. Compensation levels for female CEOs appear to lag as well, though it’s hard to tell because there are so few of them. On a recent list of America’s 200 highest-paid CEOs, only 11 were women, and their median pay was $1.6 million less than their male peers. Certain of these women are already household names: Yahoo’s Marissa Mayer, No. 34 on the list, who earned $25 million last year, and Hewlett-Packard’s Meg Whitman, No. 95, who earned $17 million. But the highest-paid female CEO in America is not nearly as well known. She is Martine Rothblatt, the 59-year-old founder of United Therapeutics—a publicly traded, Silver Spring, Maryland–based pharmaceutical company—who made a previous fortune as the founder of Sirius Radio, a field she entered as an attorney specializing in the law of space. But what’s really extraordinary about Rothblatt’s ascent is not that she has leaned in, or out, or had any particular thoughts about having it all. What sets Rothblatt apart from the other women on the list is that she—who earned $38 million last year—was born male.\n\n“It’s like winning the lottery,” Rothblatt said happily after seeing her name atop the list during one of the meetings I had with her this summer. But Rothblatt could not be less interested in establishing herself as a role model for women. “I can’t claim that what I have achieved is equivalent to what a woman has achieved. For the first half of my life, I was male.”\n\nIn person, Martine is magnificent, like a tall lanky teenage boy with breasts. She wears no makeup or jewelry, and she inhabits her muted clothing—jeans, a T-shirt, a floppy button-down thrown on top—in the youthful, offhand way of the tech elite. Martine is transgender, a power trans, which makes her an even rarer species in the corporate jungle than a female CEO. And she seems genuinely to revel in her self-built in-betweenness. Just after her sex-reassignment surgery, her appearance was more feminine than it is today—old photos show her wearing lipstick, her long, curly hair loose about her shoulders. But in the years since she has developed her own unisexual style. She is a person for whom gender matters enough to have undergone radical surgery, but not enough to care whether she’s called he or she by people, like her 83-year-old mother, who occasionally lose track of which pronouns to use.\n\nWhat she prefers to be called is “Martine.” To her four young grandchildren she is “Grand Martine.” Bina Aspen, the woman who married Martine 33 years ago, when Martine was a man, and remains her devoted wife, calls herself not straight or gay but “Martine-­sexual”—as in the only person she wants to have sex with is Martine. Together Martine and Bina have four children, and they refer to Martine as “Martine” in conversations with strangers. At home, they call her “Dad.”\n\nIn 1995, just after her transition, Martine published The Apartheid of Sex, a slim manifesto that insisted on an overhaul of “dimorphic” (her word) gender categories. “There are five billion people in the world and five billion unique sexual identities,” she wrote. “Genitals are as irrelevant to one’s role in society as skin tone. Hence, the legal division of people into males and females is as wrong as the legal division of people into black and white races.” Instead, she suggested people might better express their gender and sexual identities on a spectrum, perhaps in terms of color: Green might be “an equally aggressive/nurturing person who does not try to appear sexy” (lime green would be someone a little less aggressive), and purple might be someone gentle, nourishing, and erotic in equal measure.","can_reply":false},{"blog_name":"prisonerofthetimewar","id":96938897065,"post_url":"http://prisonerofthetimewar.tumblr.com/post/96938897065/went-home-today","slug":"went-home-today","type":"text","date":"2014-09-08 02:49:52 GMT","timestamp":1410144592,"state":"published","format":"html","reblog_key":"8NFnYgVI","tags":["trans","transman","ftm","coming out","help"],"short_url":"http://tmblr.co/Z-xtkm1QI0Ywf","followed":false,"highlighted":[],"liked":false,"note_count":6,"title":"Went home today...","body":"I don’t even know why I thought going home was a good idea. My mom wasn’t there, so I thought it wouldn’t be difficult. I was wrong. \n\nAmazing talents my parents possess:\n-making me feel like shit\n-making me feel alone in the world (even when i’m not).\n\nAll pictures of me have been taken down. So even without speaking i felt like a steaming pile of horse dung. And there was the conversation with my dad… apparently Mom is going to a therapist and is getting feed the crap that she is right in all of this. (HOW THE HELL DOES TELLING YOUR CHILD THAT THEY SHOULD HAVE KILLED YOU INSTEAD OF COMING OUT AS TRANS “RIGHT”?) and that even though he is calm, in no away does he accept this. He even brought up the fact that I’m signing my emails Andy instead of Andie now. \n\nI had pointed out that everyone was good with this and my professors were supportive. His reaction? “they aren’t close to you. they can walk away after this and forget all about it. We cant because we’re the closest too you” so basically he said that no one is actually accepting and never will be?\n\nI don’t know anymore. Everyone keeps telling me to take care of myself. Its really hard to do that when my parents are like this…Does anyone have advice on dealing with close-minded parents that are not accepting at all?","can_reply":false},{"blog_name":"maoxiaoquan","id":96938444588,"post_url":"http://maoxiaoquan.tumblr.com/post/96938444588/when-you-meet-someone-with-your-given-name","slug":"when-you-meet-someone-with-your-given-name","type":"text","date":"2014-09-08 02:44:37 GMT","timestamp":1410144277,"state":"published","format":"markdown","reblog_key":"yG40dOZ1","tags":["trans","transgender","moi","my post","gotye","ftm","mtf","trans people","name","maoxiaoquan"],"short_url":"http://tmblr.co/ZHN_ts1QH_qSi","followed":false,"highlighted":[],"liked":false,"note_count":1,"title":"When you meet someone with your given name","body":"","can_reply":false},{"blog_name":"sffrontrunners","id":96938050477,"post_url":"http://sffrontrunners.tumblr.com/post/96938050477/webfoot-week-37-9-7-9-13-2014","slug":"webfoot-week-37-9-7-9-13-2014","type":"text","date":"2014-09-08 02:40:00 GMT","timestamp":1410144000,"state":"published","format":"html","reblog_key":"FjiMc3PE","tags":["gya","lesbian","bisexual","trans","jog","jogging","run","running","walk","walking","san francisco","gay games","front runners","frontrunners","sffr","sffrontrunners","golden gate park"],"short_url":"http://tmblr.co/Z1K4Hw1QHzKEj","followed":false,"highlighted":[],"liked":false,"note_count":1,"title":"Webfoot Week 37 (9/7-9/13) 2014","body":"NEWS\n\nSFFR App Available for Download – Download the app to your smart phone to be up to date with all the SFFR news and events.\n\nwww.sffr.org/app\n\nUPCOMING EVENTS\n1) Movie Night – Friday, September 12 @ 19:00 (7:00 p.m.);
